title: Gold and Silver in Modest Retreat After Surging to Record Highs
description: Gold and silver dipped after surging to records in the previous session as investors piled into commodities as an alternative to other financial assets.
content: Gold and silver dipped after surging to records in the previous session as investors piled into commodities as an alternative to other financial assets.
